name: Otherside (Gizmo199)
description:
Welcome to Otherside, you have arrived in limbo! Do you want to move on? Your gonna need some soul coins! yeah...not much different than here on earth. You play as a boy in this RPG style quest game to collect soul coins in hopes to move on to.... the Other side. But there is a catch, and not all good deeds go un-punished...

Controls:

Movement - [WASD] / [Arrows] / Joystick / Dpad

Running - [Shift] / (A) button

Interact - [F] / (B) button

Awards:

This game won 1st place in the GMC Jam 36 4 day weekend competition!
